* The championship game of the Major League Cricket (MLC) tournament will be held in Dallas this year.
* The tournament has partnered with Royal, a brand of Authentic Basmati rice, to enhance the fan experience.
* As part of the partnership, Royal will provide experiential activations at stadium matches, social media giveaways, player engagement, and other initiatives to engage current fans and introduce new individuals to the sport.

The Seattle Orcas had a disappointing season in MLC 2, finishing at the bottom of the table with only 2 points. They lost their final match to the Texas Super Kings by 37 runs, capping off a poor season. The team, which has a heavy South African presence, struggled with tired international players who came straight from the World Cup. The Orcas struggled to score consistently, particularly when batting first, and failed to win a match when opening with the batting since July 15, 2023. In their final match, Ayan Desai made a promising debut, taking 2 wickets and scoring 30 runs, but the team's batting performance was poor, with no player scoring more than 26 runs. Despite the disappointing season, the article views MLC season 2 as a positive step forward for cricket in the United States.

**Match Details**

* The match is a qualifier for the final of the Major League Cricket tournament in 2024.
* The teams playing are Washington Freedom (league winners) and San Francisco Unicorns (second-place finishers).
* The match will take place on Thursday, July 25, 2024, at the Grand Prairie Stadium in Dallas, Texas, United States.

**Team Forms**

* Washington Freedom lost their last match against San Francisco Unicorns, ending their unbeaten record in the tournament. Their last three results are LWW.
* San Francisco Unicorns have a winning streak going into the qualifier, having beaten Washington Freedom in their last match. Their last three results are WWW.

**Key Players**

* For Washington Freedom, openers Travis Head and Steve Smith have been in good form, combining for 385 runs in the tournament. Rachin Ravindra is also a key player, providing a handy spin option for the team.
* For San Francisco Unicorns, opener Finn Allen has been explosive with the bat, scoring 186 runs, including 15 sixes. Sanjay Krishnamurthi has also been in good form, scoring 79 runs off 42 balls in the last match against Washington Freedom.

**Prediction**

* The expert prediction is that Washington Freedom will bounce back strongly and win the match, with their bowlers showing a marked improvement and helping the team to victory.

* Australian cricketer Steve Smith is having a great season in MLC 2024, showcasing his batting prowess and captaincy skills for the Washington Freedom team.
* In a recent match against the San Francisco Unicorns, Smith scored 56 runs off 31 balls, with 5 boundaries and 4 maximums, displaying his flexibility and unerring style in the modern mode of the game.
* Smith has been one of the top performers in MLC 2024, with 247 runs in 7 games at an average of 61.75 and a strike rate of 144.44, making him one of the principal run-makers in the competition.
* He has played a significant role in the Washington Freedom's campaign, helping the team maintain a solid standing in the league.
* The Washington Freedom will face the San Francisco Unicorns again in the first semifinal of the tournament on Friday, and Smith is optimistic about his team's chances despite a recent loss.
* Smith's journey in MLC 2024 is a story of revival, as he has experienced misfortune in international T20 cricket, but is now reintroducing himself as a force to be reckoned with.
* His captaincy skills have also been instrumental in the team's success, and his maturity and experience have benefited the young players in the team.

* The two teams previously met, with San Francisco Unicorns winning the match.
* Washington Freedom posted 174/3 in 15.3 overs before rain intervened.
* San Francisco Unicorns chased down the target with 6 wickets in hand, thanks to Josh Inglis (45) and Sanjay Krishnamurthi (79).

**Result of Washington Freedom's match against San Francisco Unicorns:** Washington Freedom won by 7 wickets against San Francisco Unicorns in the qualifier match, with Travis Head scoring an unbeaten 77 off 44 balls.

**Match details:** San Francisco Unicorns were bowled out for 145, and Washington Freedom chased the target in 16 overs, with Travis Head's partnership with Glenn Maxwell (54 off 23 balls) being instrumental in their victory.

**Tournament update:** With this win, Washington Freedom became the first team to reach the MLC finals. San Francisco Unicorns will now face Texas Super Kings in the Challenger to qualify for the final.

**Match Result**: Texas Super Kings won the Eliminator match against MI New York by 9 wickets, chasing down a target of 164 with 18.3 overs to spare.

**Key Performers**: Faf du Plessis scored 72 off 47 balls, while Devon Conway contributed an unbeaten 51 off 43 deliveries to drive the Texas Super Kings' victory.

**Tournament Implication**: With this win, Texas Super Kings advance in the major league cricket tournament, establishing themselves as strong contenders for the title.

**Captain's Impact**: Faf du Plessis' captaincy and batting performance were instrumental in Texas Super Kings' success.

* The match was an eliminator encounter between MI New York and Texas Super Kings (TSK) in the ongoing Major League Cricket 2024 season.
* Rashid Khan played a brilliant knock of 55 runs in 30 balls, including 4 boundaries and 4 sixes, which was reminiscent of AB de Villiers and MS Dhoni's playing style.
* Despite Rashid's efforts, MI New York lost the match by 9 wickets, with TSK chasing down the target of 164 runs easily.
* Devon Conway and Faf du Plessis scored clinical fifties to help TSK win the match and secure a spot in Qualifier 2.

* The article reports on the Qualifier 1 match of the Major League Cricket 2024 between San Francisco Unicorns and Washington Freedom in Dallas.
* Glenn Maxwell, playing for Washington Freedom, scored a fiery half-century with five sixes, remaining unbeaten on 54 off 23 balls, to help his team chase down the target of 146 runs in 15.3 overs with seven wickets in hand.
* Maxwell's notable hit was a 103-metre six off Pakistan bowler Hassan Khan's fullish tossed-up delivery, which cleared the boundary rope and landed in the crowd.
* Travis Head, another Australian player, also made a significant contribution with a knock of 77 runs in 44 balls.
* Washington Freedom won the match and advanced to the final, while San Francisco Unicorns will play against Texas Super Kings in the Challenger to determine the other finalist.

The Washington Freedom team defeated the Texas Super Kings by 42 runs to maintain their top position in the Major League Cricket points table. The match was played at the Grand Prairie Stadium in Dallas. Washington Freedom posted a target of 206 runs, thanks to strong performances from Steve Smith (57), Travis Head (53), Glenn Maxwell (34), and Obus Pienaar (33). In response, the Texas Super Kings were bowled out for 164 runs, despite a quickfire fifty from Faf du Plessis. Rachin Ravindra took four wickets, and Jasdeep Singh and Glenn Maxwell shared the remaining wickets to ensure Washington's victory.

The Major League Cricket (MLC) 2024 season is ongoing, and Travis Head of the Washington Freedom team has been making headlines with his exceptional performance. He has scored five consecutive half-centuries, becoming the second Australian player to achieve this milestone in T20 cricket. Head's scores include 54 runs against LA Knight Riders, 54 runs against MI New York, 54 runs against Texas Super Kings, 56 runs against San Francisco Unicorns, and an unbeaten 77 runs against San Francisco Unicorns in the qualifier match. His impressive form has helped Washington Freedom dominate the tournament, and they have qualified for the final match after winning the qualifier against San Francisco Unicorns by 7 wickets. In the qualifier match, Head played a crucial role, scoring an unbeaten 77 runs, while Glenn Maxwell remained unbeaten on 54 runs.

**Match Details**

* Teams: Washington Freedom vs San Francisco Unicorns
* Date: July 26, 2024 (Friday)
* Time: 6:00 AM IST
* Venue: Grand Prairie Cricket Stadium, Dallas

* Washington Freedom has qualified for the final of the MLC 2024 season after defeating San Francisco Unicorns by 7 wickets in the Qualifier at Grand Prairie Stadium in Dallas.
* Rachin Ravindra took 4/11, his career-best figures in T20 cricket, and Marco Jansen took 3/46 to bowl out San Francisco Unicorns for 145. Hassan Khan top-scored for SFU with 57 off 36 balls.
* In reply, Travis Head scored an unbeaten 77 off 44 balls, his highest score this season, and Glenn Maxwell smashed 54 off 23 balls to help Washington Freedom chase down the target in 15.3 overs.
* This was Head's fifth consecutive fifty in MLC 2024, and Maxwell's innings included five sixes and four boundaries.
* Washington Freedom will now play in the final of MLC 2024 on Sunday at Grand Prairie Stadium in Dallas.

**Match Result:** Texas Super Kings defeated Seattle Orcas by 37 runs in the final league match of MLC 2024.

**Texas Super Kings' Performance:** Led by Calvin Savage, the team scored 177/8, with Calvin Savage top-scoring with 45* off 27 balls and Faf Du Plessis contributing 39 off 17 balls. The team's bowlers, including Ottneil Bartmann (3/20), Noor Ahmad, and Calvin Savage, restricted the Seattle Orcas to 140/9.

**Seattle Orcas' Performance:** The team struggled to chase down the target, with Quinton de Kock and Shehan Jayasuriya getting out early. Shubham Ranjane and Keemo Paul's efforts were not enough to save the match. Keemo Paul was the best bowler for the Seattle Orcas, taking 2/18.

**Tournament Implications:** The Texas Super Kings secured their spot in the eliminator match against MI New York, while the Seattle Orcas ended their campaign with six losses and only one win.
